content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The final price was not agreed upon. The last proposed price from my perspective as a greedy landlord was 929 Euros per month, but the potential tenant was willing to pay 925 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I am not satisfied with the outcome. As a greedy landlord, I would have preferred a higher price than the last proposed amount of 929 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt
